plot outline: Ashok falls in love with a girl named Swati but doesn't have enough money to ask for her hand in marriage. For this, he decides to pursue a northern treasure known as Uttara, but in the process ends up getting tangled with a powerful landlord called Rudrayya.
title: Utthara
plot: Ashok falls in love with a girl named Swati but doesn't have enough money to ask for her hand in marriage. For this, he decides to pursue a northern treasure known as Uttara, but in the process ends up getting tangled with a powerful landlord called Rudrayya.
